Text: Meeting with Jeff Skilling at Enron Cc to TedHallMasa I enjoyed our evening together on the boat in Yokohama harbor very much As promised I have been in contact with Jeff Skilling at Enron He is interested in meeting with you I have been speaking with Jeffs assistant regarding appropriate dates and mentioned the dates when you will be in New York in May I suggest that your respective offices work together to settle the logistical details Joannie Williamson will handle the arrangements for Jeff email phone I am sure you will have a very interesting conversation If I can help in any other way please let me know Very best regards Ted tedhallvcf
